website_summaries.verdict: A light up and talking version of Ariel in a Disney Princess toddler doll.
pros: These are a good choice for very young children who might not have the dexterity to be able to dress and manipulate the "fashion doll" style princesses
cons: The price on this and other toddler style dolls are higher than the fashion style dolls, but they are also larger dolls

customer_reviews.title: makes bath time fun
customer_reviews.text: So the idea of the doll singing different songs dry vs in the water is a nice feature, almost gimicky but my daughter likes it. Main reason for the 4 stars is because the hair takes for ever to dry. Over night air drying and didn’t dry. Sometimes I even use the hair dryer on low. Also I feel like they could have put more songs/talking for when outside and under water. I’m also concerned about mold on the inside as it always seems to still be wet.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This only worked as advertised for 20 minutes of Christmas Day. After that she stopped singing under the sea all together and hasn’t sang it again since. Which of course was my daughters favorite. Going to try removing the batteries and reinstalling to see if it resets, otherwise will more than likely return as try again. However the review left before mine doesn’t make this option sound promising either.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter Bunny brought this for my 2 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it! She says a few things and sings a song before going in water. After she has been in the water she says even more things and sings another song. Her hair dries overnight after being in the bath so my daughter and carry her around the house again. Great value too, saw this at target for $30 something!
customer_reviews.author: Tisernia

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but loud
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll for any Ariel lover as my daughter is obsessed. It can go in the water which is cool. My only complaint is that it is loud. There’s no volume control at all. Other than that it’s super well made and cute!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Only sings “part of your world”
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews mentioned, she originally sang both “under the sea” and “part of your world” but for some reason will only sing “part of your world” now. My daughter loves the doll but keeps asking how to get the other song to play. Would be great if there was some solution to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece for her birthday and she absolutely loves it! however she only really seems to say the same five phrases. the song is pretty catchy and the doll is beautiful the packaging was a little damage and upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: DreamandBelieve

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after one day.
customer_reviews.text: Used once, audio clips out. Does not sing or any other features. Simply “hi, my name is Ariel (beep)” purchased for my 3 year old’s birthday; now she’s upset. Save your money, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Regalia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She is so pretty, sings well. I just don’t see how you can put her in the water. Her voice box isn’t protected and would get wet and damaged, no?
customer_reviews.author: Monika Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll and it can get wet!
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughters 3rd Birthday present. She loved it. Beautiful doll, lights up and sings. Perfect! She took her in the pool and the tub
customer_reviews.author: kkinkeylargo

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for the water
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter’s 3rd birthday and she absolutely loves her! She’s been in the tub and the pool fully submerged and still sings. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rmh003

customer_reviews.title: Speakers gave out after 3 months should be more durable since it's made to submerge in water
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months speaker does not work because water got in speakers... Shouldn't they be made for submerssion?
customer_reviews.author: will Grand

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets tangled easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a 5 year olds birthday. Noticed that the hair gets tangled easily the next time my daughter and the birthday girl had a play date. The girls loved the singing and sparkly tail though.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed the kids
customer_reviews.text: The Doll was a Gift and really impressed the kids ,good for 4 ,5 years old girls ,It sings a little,and lights up .
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy hair
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was so excited to earn this mermaid as a reward and when we opened the box and got her out, there were crunchy crusty patches in her hair and one arm was loose.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use.
customer_reviews.text: After one use it’s broken I can’t believe it. I gave it as a gift for my baby daughter and she played once on the water with her and now the plastic in her tummy broke (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was my granddaughters favorite gift at her birthday party and she plays with it constantly! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Doll
customer_reviews.text: We had this doll for a little over a week. So far so good. The doll is gorgeous. The tail has glitter that moves around and she sings and says a couple of phrases. her voice is very clear. We don’t normally put dolls or barbies in the bathtub with our girls, so I can’t rate that part but she is a great doll for any girl who loves the little mermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Lenin

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler little mermaid toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for little mermaid lovers. Fact that she's water proof is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: princessSarah

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! My 13 month old absolutely adores her! Her hair isn’t like all the other dolls out there. It’s soft and doesn’t tangle as easily. So cute and actually works! I highly recommend this for all the little mermaid fans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for mermaid loving girl
customer_reviews.text: Sings only the one song... but other than that my niece absolutely loves it, takes it swimming and everywhere she goes!
customer_reviews.author: Linar

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for a 5 year old Ana she loved it, box wasn’t damage
customer_reviews.author: Erica Streete

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid fans approve!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! Nice that it can go in the water with them!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McFall

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it for her bath, when she touch water her tail lights up
customer_reviews.author: May Ling Heath

customer_reviews.title: It sings its great for any age
customer_reviews.text: I like this princess it's perfect for a birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift and the child absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: barbarajean6193

customer_reviews.title: Well grandma did good
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loves it. It sings sparkles talks to her. The only thing that’s annoying is her crown. Doesn’t stay on. Needs combs to stay on. It’s wothless the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: dana servatius

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift. My daughter got this for her mermaid birthday party. She loves bath time and summer swimming with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lovesssss
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 year old grand-daughter! She loves it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the doll. Bought it for my granddaughter and she loved it. Awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the bath
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my god daughter. She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jozee

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter who recently love Ariel so much. Baby girl loved it so much! Sings a different song when put in water..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it..
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves it ariel is one of her favorite princesses.
customer_reviews.author: melissa lynne

customer_reviews.title: Excelente Gift
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy if you daughter likes mermaids. My nephew liked it very much this present.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Canales

customer_reviews.title: I paid for a NEW doll and i received an open package.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift for my niece but the box came open and taped together. I am incredibly UPSET.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: In the water it plays ALL the songs.....
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a gift for my 4 year old. It's a HUGE hit! My 8 year old even wants one. It's super sparkly and has glitter that moves like a snowglobe in the tail. It only sings one song when out of the water, but sings the additional song when submerged in the bath. Guessing the other disappointed reviewers didn't put the doll in water. Hair has held up well in water and is still brushable & lovely. She can stand on her tail to dry out -- great design. I hate when bath toys get gross from not being able to properly dry.
customer_reviews.author: M.M. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think the other reviewers actually read the instructions. In demo mode it sings both songs, afterwards on “land” it sings only one song but it you place the tail in water up to its bottom (you can see the two small circular metal sensors- like buttons) then it sings under the sea and says other things like swim with me. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but don't be surprised if you can't get the original song back once the tail gets wet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sings and lights up. Tells you to get tail wet to unlock new song and phrases. Now that's all it does. Can't get back to original song or phrases. My three year old doesn't seem to notice or be bothered by it, just me. Also for a product that wants kids to get the tail wet they should make it safe to fully submerge. The speakers got wet and luckily dried out. Could have easily been the end of her singing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well....
customer_reviews.text: This product was suppose to have “20 phrases” and “2songs”. It only plays one song and only has two phrases. I’m very disappointed but my daughter loves it and it was a gift. It did not come with an instruction manual but from what I read in the comments... hold the seashell necklace for 5 seconds. I will be trying that. I also do not know why there is a button on the back of her neck. What is it for?
customer_reviews.author: brandee

customer_reviews.title: Battery Cover Broken
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the doll, but the back battery cover came defective and it will not stay on the Doll. The part that screws in was broken off and so the batteries are exposed. I can’t even let my daughter play with it unattended and definitely can’t put it in the water with it that way. It was a gift so I did not know where to exchange it and did not have a receipt. If the cover were replaced it would be a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: KrissyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: READ THE MANUAL!!
customer_reviews.text: For everyone having issues with the doll only "singing one song" you're supposed to put it in the water for it to sing the other song. It says everything you need to know right on the manual. If you're lost on getting it out of DEMO mode hold in the seashell for 5 seconds. I'm surprised on all the bad reviews most likely because people can not read. Anywho, the doll is very lovely and has a very clear voice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This doll is not meant to get wet as surprising as that may sound. She completely fills with mold and it is disgusting. She also doesn't sing after she gets what. A waste! And the hair is unmanageable after being wet too! What is this?!?!
customer_reviews.author: jay metts

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: She loved it. Flexible arms light was bright and beautiful. Great size for lil girls.
customer_reviews.author: BKK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but stuck in demo mode
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll but we cannot get her out of demo mode to sing/say more songs. We've tried holding down her shell necklace button, as suggested in comments here, with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Resseguie

product_meta.title: Disney Princess 78869 Sing & Sparkle Ariel
product_meta.description: Princess Ariel is sparkling from tiara to tail and ready for adventure on land and under the sea! Press her necklace or place her in water and watch as her tail lights up creating a glittery light show. She sings "part of your world" And "under the sea" And says phrases. Requires 3 AAA batteries (included). for ages 3 and up.
feature_bullets: Princess Ariel is sparkling from tiara to tail and ready for adventure on land under the sea
Press her necklace or place her in water and watch as her tail lights up creating a glittery light show
She sings "Part of your world" And "under the sea" And says phrases
Requires 3 AAA batteries (included). batteries included are for "Try Me" Purposes. Doll default is "try Me" Mode. To begin play, switch to "normal play" Mode.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars327 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
